exchange_update_billing_periode_intro:
Select the automatic renewal period you want for each account.
This will be applied from the next renewal.
exchange_update_billing_periode_action_D: Switch to “Close when service reaches expiry date”
exchange_update_billing_periode_value_DE: Close when service reaches expiry date
exchange_update_billing_periode_delete_w: Important! With this option, the service will close on the expiry date, and all data associated with it will be permanently deleted. You will be unable to retrieve the account data.
exchange_update_billing_periode_resume: You are about to change the renewal period of your accounts:
exchange_update_billing_periode_success: The renewal periods for the accounts selected have been updated.
exchange_update_billing_periode_partial: Some renewal periods could not be updated.
exchange_update_billing_periode_failure: An error has occurred updating the account renewal
